name: Apple - iPhone 6s 64GB - Space Gray (Verizon Wireless)

A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life and iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.
microdata.description: A 4.7-inch Retina HD display with 3D Touch. 7000 series aluminum and stronger cover glass. An A9 chip with 64-bit desktop-class architecture. All new 12MP iSight camera with Live Photos. Touch ID. Faster LTE and Wi-Fi. Long battery life and iOS 9 and iCloud. All in a smooth, continuous unibody design.

reviews.name: love the phone
reviews.author: AJRN
reviews.description: my sister loves her phone and the color, still working well

reviews.name: Love the touch sensitivity on the iPhone 6
reviews.author: JAHJAH210
reviews.description: My iPhone 6s is noticeably faster than the iPhone 6 I had. The touch screen is so much better and it logs me in immediately as opposed to multiply tries like the iPhone 6.

reviews.name: Great smartphone
reviews.author: PurplePeopleEater
reviews.description: I previously had an iPhone 5c which was wonderful for my first smartphone. However, the iPhone 6S is a delightful step up. It's faster, has more functions, and the larger screen is a bonus. I have it stored safely inside of a LifeProof case. I can still hear from the speakers just fine, even though it is fully enclosed. It is a great combination - 6S and LifeProof.

reviews.name: Awesome
reviews.author: Pete
reviews.description: Perfect size, great speed and Live is really cool.

reviews.name: Lots of great features on the iphone
reviews.author: Hectus
reviews.description: A little hesitant to make the transition from the Galaxy to iPhone. We made the decision and are very happy with our choice to make the move. Love the feel of it and it is very user friendly

reviews.name: great phone
reviews.author: NORLINA
reviews.description: The phone is great and has a wonderful size. It is just big enough and has a great camera. The screen is big and allows for viewing photos and videos without having to zoom in. Absolutely love it!

reviews.name: Great smart phone for simplicity
reviews.author: Junior
reviews.description: Very good starter phone in this smart phone day and age

reviews.name: iPhone Does it Again
reviews.author: TagLos
reviews.description: I wasn't sure if I should upgrade my iPhone 5s, but Best Buy was having such a great deal, that I just had to do it. I love this phone. I got the rose gold which is beautiful. The 3D touch is really handy as well. I'm so glad I upgraded.

reviews.name: Great phone!
reviews.author: bestbuyman
reviews.description: This is my second iPhone and will always stick with them!
reviews.reviews: Posted by: from: chicago, Il on

reviews.name: iPhone 6s
reviews.author: Jrf0044
reviews.description: Way better than my 5 better quality pictures and battery life.
